channel.title: How do i take items out of a shop
channel.description:
Can some1 tell me where to go and what to do take some items out of a shop the items i want to be rare.
Thanks

item.title: How do i take items out of a shop
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hey just go to shops.cfg and right click and click (open with) and choose notepad, wordpad or microsoft word
then go to your shop in top of the shops it is a name search that in shops.cfg and find the item id u wanna delete

Read full topic
item.source: How do i take items out of a shop

item.title: How do i take items out of a shop
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

I went to my config folder but it only has objects.cfg but i found shops.cfg outside the folder but i cant open it, its a cfg file

Can you give me the link to a program to open it

Read full topic

item.title: How do i take items out of a shop
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Go into your config folder and find shops.cfgâ€¦ Search the item id of the item you want to take out and delete the item id and the number to the right.
